ValidationRule.description: The amount on a closed won opportunity cannot be changed except from the change request flow. // JC Updated to include isWon (causing Validation Errors on Test Classes)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.IsBypassVR__c = FALSE, IsWon = true, IsAdjustedByChangeRequest__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(Amount) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The amount of a closed won opportunity cannot be changed.[VR31]
